title: Streamixio
author: Streamixio
content: Your Crypto Safety Net: Reliable Research for Worry-Free InvestmentsDiscover peace of mind with our project research services. We provide accurate project information and hassle-free crypto investment updates, ensuring the safety of your token investments.Say goodbye to the noise on social media platforms and the hassle of independent news monitoring.When it comes to cryptocurrency investments, trust us as your reliable source.Click the link below to see how we help people just like you! link: https://rebrand.ly/swapsignalsoffer8

comments.author: Z-tight
comments.body: Quote from: Streamixio on October 07, 2023, 05:09:21 PMDiscover peace of mind with our project research services. We provide accurate project information and hassle-free crypto investment updates, ensuring the safety of your token investments.How do you ensure the safety of people's tokens, majority of new projects turn out to be a scam, so even if what you say is true and you provide information about these projects, it won't stop them from turning into a scam. Take note that 99% of new crypto projects are created to make the owners rich, and your service isn't going to do anything to change that fact.Quote from: Streamixio on October 07, 2023, 05:09:21 PMWhen it comes to cryptocurrency investments, trust us as your reliable source.When it comes to crypto, i would prefer to only use a trustless coin; and that's BTC.

comments.author: The Cryptovator
comments.body: I don't think it's necessary to use any third-party website to check how secure a project is. Because it can show you data that is available to the public. It can't be sure whether the project will scam or rug-pull. There aren't any such tools to show scam projects or legit projects. They would make the data available online. So any user could check it themselves manually and decide if it's secure to invest. Any investment in a new project is highly risky. Because 99% of projects are dead after a few days,

comments.author: coin-investor
comments.body: Quote from: Streamixio on October 07, 2023, 05:09:21 PMClick the link below to see how we help people just like you! link: https://rebrand.ly/swapsignalsoffer8No one is allowed to post a link shortener here you are breaking the forum rule I thought this rebrandly is the site you're promoting until I saw that I landed on a swapsognal site and checking the rebrand domain you are using a link shortener, if you're a representative of the platform I have no reason to trust for how you promote the platform that you represent.Code:https://www.rebrandly.com/Quote from: mprep on July 21, 2014, 05:27:51 PM4. No referral code (ref link) spam. [1]5. No link shorteners that require users to view an ad.

comments.author: Darker45
comments.body: I didn't click on the link. But since you're already here presenting your new service, how about you tell us exactly how you will do it? Are the project information that you'd provide something that the investors cannot themselves access? If they are, how do you gather them? If they aren't, then why should they need you?The same question as to the updates that you'd provide. Will you be providing them before all the announcements, press releases, and news? If you will, I'm curious how you get insider information from so many different projects. If you won't, then I see no need of your services. Anyway, I guess there's no service that can ensure in any way the safety of anybody's token investment. If I invest in Kim Kardashian Inu (KKI)-- an actual token, by the way-- for example, how could you guarantee me of a worry-free investment?

comments.author: PX-Z
comments.body: Quote from: coin-investor on October 08, 2023, 12:36:36 AMNo one is allowed to post a link shortener here you are breaking the forum rule Quote from: mprep on July 21, 2014, 05:27:51 PM5. No link shorteners that require users to view an ad.Rebrandly is a url shortener that doesn't require users to view an ad, so it does not break the rule #5. But i can't access the url, saying a dns error.Regarding the OP, i don't think such third party service is really a must have. As long those details are on the internet that can be research publicly viewed, then no need to hire someone to do it for you.

comments.author: robelneo
comments.body: If you're a whale who likes to invest in new projects and $7 a month is peanut for you then this is the kind of service that you could use, it's better to offer a free vouch although not obligatory for people to see how good your service is, In my opinion, 7 projects in your $7 plan, are very manageable even if we don't use this platform we can still manage to see the development and warning signs of projects if investors know the basics of how to look at the project.

comments.author: Aanuoluwatofunmi
comments.body: Quote from: Z-tight on October 07, 2023, 09:46:41 PMQuote from: Streamixio on October 07, 2023, 05:09:21 PMDiscover peace of mind with our project research services. We provide accurate project information and hassle-free crypto investment updates, ensuring the safety of your token investments.How do you ensure the safety of people's tokens, majority of new projects turn out to be a scam, so even if what you say is true and you provide information about these projects, it won't stop them from turning into a scam. Take note that 99% of new crypto projects are created to make the owners rich, and your service isn't going to do anything to change that fact.Quote from: Streamixio on October 07, 2023, 05:09:21 PMWhen it comes to cryptocurrency investments, trust us as your reliable source.When it comes to crypto, i would prefer to only use a trustless coin; and that's BTC.In addition to what you've already said, we can also look into this, If tokens themselves are not to be trusted as others may have thought, why should one entrust his own tokens with your organization when anything can happen to any invested token at anytime, are you making an insurance offer your users can leave on even when the unforeseen should strike and everything turns out to be scam, you need to come out more clear regarding this for people to see.
